ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The people of Lut denied the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The people of Lot accused the messengers of lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The people of Lot rejected the Messengers, branding them liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of Lot rejected the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The people of Lut denied the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The people of Lut denied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The people of Lut gave the lie to the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The people of Lot cried lies to the Envoys
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The folk of Lot denied the messengers (of Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then the people of Lot rejected the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The people of Lut belied the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The people of Lot impugned the apostles
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The people of Lut rejected the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The prople of Lout (Lot) (those dwelt in the towns of Sodom in Palestine) belied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The people of Lot disbelieved the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The people of Lot denied the messengers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:160] The people of Lot denied the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The folk of Lot denied the messengers (of Allah)) the people of Lot denied Lot and they also denied all the messengers mentioned to them by Lot,
